title: The Forgotten Catacombs
description: Navigate the ancient tile-based dungeon to find the exit and continue your quest.

#.description: A solid stone wall blocks your path.

..description: Cold stone floor stretches before you.

+.description: A heavy wooden door. You can open it.

@.description: A rusty key lies on the floor. You pick it up.

*.description: A chest containing gold and items!

X.description: The exit! You can leave the dungeon now.

controls: Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Press Space to interact with objects.
exitCondition: Reach the exit tile marked with 'X'
